Package com.circa.mrv.grs_manager.product.validator

Class InvalidTransitionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.circa.mrv.grs_manager.product.validator.InvalidTransitionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class InvalidTransitionException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Creates a new checked exception. Can be passed a exception message string or can use the default.
    Author:
    Ben Ioppolo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors

      InvalidTransitionException()

      creates an exception with message.
